summary: Jhin Avdo is a two handed soul eater.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Georgia][size=4]Jhin Avdo is a two handed sword.Biger than normal swords.

[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=4]He's an "eater of souls" but i didnt give him soul trap attachment becouse i hate attachments. xD
[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=4]He has also glowing crystal like soul game thats why he's named Jhin. Jhin is like demon.
[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=4]This is my first mod so if any other modeler see this i will appreciate some advice.Â [/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=4]
[/size][/font][/b][b][font=Georgia][size=4]To get this weapon in game,open console and type "help avdo" than you will get ID.[/size][/font][/b][size=4][b][font=Georgia]
[/font][/b]
[/size][b][font=Georgia][size=4]Cheers.
[/size][/font][/b][i][u][size=3]
Programs used: 3ds max 2014,gimp,nifskope,Creation kit.
[/size][/u][/i]
author: dzevaover
